Package duke.task

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • duke.task.Task
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Deadline, Event, Todo
    public class Task
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the task item to be added into the list of tasks. The Task abstract class provides an abstraction over Todo, Deadline, Event items.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected java.lang.String description
      This is the description of the task.
      protected boolean isDone
      This is used to indicate whether the task is done.
      protected java.util.Optional<java.util.Date> reminderDate
      This is the container for the date field of the reminder set for the task.
      protected java.util.Optional<java.util.Date> taskDate
      This is the container for the date field of the task.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Task​(java.lang.String description)
      Constructs a new task with description.
      Task​(java.lang.String description, java.util.Date taskDate)
      Constructs a new task with description and date field for the task.

    • Field Detail

      • description

        protected java.lang.String description
        This is the description of the task.

      • taskDate

        protected java.util.Optional<java.util.Date> taskDate
        This is the container for the date field of the task. The container may be empty if it is a Todo task.

      • reminderDate

        protected java.util.Optional<java.util.Date> reminderDate
        This is the container for the date field of the reminder set for the task. The container may be empty if a reminder is not set for the task.

      • isDone

        protected boolean isDone
        This is used to indicate whether the task is done.

        public java.lang.String encodeOptionalDate​(java.util.Optional<java.util.Date> optionalDate)
        Encodes a date field of the task for storage.
        Parameters:
        optionalDate - the optional date to encode
        Returns:
        a string representation of the date field if present and "null" otherwise.

        public java.lang.String showFullInformation()
        Shows full information for the task with its task description, date, status and the reminder date if present.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the task. The string representation consist of the status icon with the task description.
        Overrides:

      • setReminderIfPresent

        public void setReminderIfPresent​(java.lang.String reminderDate)
                          throws InvalidDateTimeException
        Sets the reminder for the task at the specified date if a string representation of the remainder date is valid.
        Parameters:
        reminderDate - the string representation to set the reminder for the date
        Throws:
        InvalidDateTimeException - if the string representation of the date passed in has a invalid format
